The trial population include patient require valve replacement repair , atrial septal defect ( ASD ) repair , patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) closure coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) procedure . The study objective demonstrate Medtronic Cardioblate Surgical Ablation System safely effectively treat persistent AF patient .
